questions.text: On YouTube, may you be exposed to content that is inaccurate, offensive, indecent, or objectionable?
Can the user upload videos containing paid advertisement?
Which of the following videos are not allow on YouTube?

options.text: A video of an aircraft passing above an stadium during the National Anthem.
A video unboxing a new iPhone
A video where a Shakira's song is used as soundtrack
A trailer of Guardians of the Galaxy

questions.text: Who retains the video's ownership rights?
Does Google can use your video for free to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, publish and adapt?
